column4: Check out http://www.linuxcommand.org/tlcl.php for an awesome PDF on the command line.

i tried /var/tmp ..then ls -la  , i saw no, swap files at all
thanks, found them in the same dir :D

hi , any other properties that can be set on vimrc aside from these ? http://www.pastie.org/2850542
need help..can you point me to it? T_T
Check /etc/vim/vimrc
Or you can use the list here, https://wiki.archlinux.org/index.php/Vimrc
I personally do "cp /etc/vim/vimrc ~/.vimrc" then edit it to my liking.
